body.name: Irreshine Rice Toner: Rice Water Toner - Rice Milk Toner Nourish and Hydrate Dry Skin - Milky Toner - 77.78% Rice Extract - 8D Hyaluronic Acid, 5.07 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 34 mins
features: ✦[Made with 77.78% Rice Extract] Rice water toner delivers essential nutrients to the skin, supporting its overall health. The extract in rice toner contains natural exfoliating properties that gently remove dead skin. Rice Toner soothes and nourishes the skin. Hydrating toner for face, glow toner, and moisturizing toner that revitalizes dull and tired-looking skin, leaving it refreshed and rejuvenated.

✦[Hydrating] A face toner for dry skin that penetrates multiple layers of the skin, providing intense and long-lasting rice water skincare moisture. Our Rice milk toner provides deep hydration, leaving your skin feeling plump, supple, and revitalized. Milk Toner protects your skin against future damage. An effective hydrating milky toner that targets dryness and flakiness.

✦[Balance Skin tone] Rice toner can help even out skin tone, fade existing dark spots, and prevent the formation of new ones. Toner for face with rice extract provides a strong skin barrier preventing moisture loss. A face toner that reduces skin discoloration, contributing to a radiant complexion.

✦[Multi-Benefit] Our rice toner works as a moisturizing toner, for a plump and dewy skin look. Rice water toner enhances the absorption of serums and moisturizers for a more effective skincare routine. Acts as a hydrating milky toner. Hydrating toner for face reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Our skin toner for face promotes skin elasticity, resulting in firmer, smoother, and more youthful-looking skin.

✦[Gentle for All Skin Types] One of the advantages of rice water toner is it's perfect for all skin types, including sensitive skin. A soothing toner and calming toner which is effective for irritated skin. Face toner for women or men with sensitive skin helps reduce redness and discomfort. A perfect toner for sensitive skin, toner for combination skin, dry, or oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Improved my skin texture
reviews.reviewText: I love this product my skin feels so much softer and hydrated. I am 40 years old and skin care is very important to me. I found this toner on a tik tok recommending products for women over the age of 40. I ran out of my usual toner so I decided to give this one a shot and I am loving it. There is just one thing that I am not a fan of and that is the dispenser. It is kind of hard to get the product out of the bottle but other than that it’s great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changed my skin!
reviews.reviewText: My skin is super dry and after using Tretinoin my skin barrier was very damaged. I tried using every toner possible in my skin care routine and tried this on a whim and wow!! My skin has noticeably improved so much in the past two weeks and my skin is more even and not dry and flaky anymore!! Can’t reccomend enough if you have dry or damaged skin barrier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the hype!
reviews.reviewText: Just started using this product and I can already see the difference on my skin! I'm really happy with it and will continue to look for new products for them to get! I'm hooked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice moisturizing toner
reviews.reviewText: Been aware of the benefits of rice for skin and hair for a while so I decided to give this a try based on reviews and honestly the price. I was not disappointed. Seller follows up which is nice. Hoping long term results are just as good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how hydrating even a drop of this toner can be. the rice milky texture is so luxurious, and best of all the bottle is very secure, unlike other toners I've had, this one won't be leaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on skin
reviews.reviewText: When I first tried it, there was no chemical reaction to my face which I am glad for. I've been using it for a week now. It's my first step after face wash and it moisturizes my skin even before my serum. This product is a bonus with hyaluronic acid in it!

reviews.reviewerName: I have been suffering with really bad skin barrier issues for months. My texture was so bad, I had redness all around my cheeks and nose, and I would get little postules popping up. I started using this and redness has diminished significantly, my texture is smoother and no more postules. I lose this product.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin barrier repair
reviews.reviewText: Love the creaminess of this product and no fragrance. My skin texture has improved so much and is so smooth. Will Def purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super hydrating for the skin
reviews.reviewText: It really does the magic. It has a thick milky consistency and is mild on the skin. My skin is sensitive and I apply this on my face and hands twice a day and it is very hydrating. I am very happy with the results.
